Breadth-First.Explanation: Initial broad description and intent to gather clues.
Listing architectural features as general clues.
Observing people and activity for contextual clues.
Noting overall design elements to further collect broad clues.

Depth-First.Explanation: Proposing and preparing to verify a specific location hypothesis.

Breadth-Depth Switch.Explanation: Shift from general clue collection to verifying a specific hypothesis (Stuttgart City Library).
